name: UISpringTimingParameters
desc: The timing information for animations that mimics the behavior of a spring.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a default timing parameters object.

items.name: init(dampingRatio: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates a timing parameters object with the specified damping ratio.

items.name: init(dampingRatio: CGFloat, initialVelocity: CGVector)
items.desc: Creates a timing parameters object with the specified damping ratio and initial velocity.

items.name: init(mass: CGFloat, stiffness: CGFloat, damping: CGFloat, initialVelocity: CGVector)
items.desc: Creates a timing parameters object with the specified spring stiffness, mass, damping coefficient, and initial velocity.

items.name: var initialVelocity: CGVector
items.desc: The target propertyâ€™s rate of change at the start of a spring animation, enabling a smooth transition into the animation.
